Code

Preformatted

Code

@media (min-width: $breakpoint-small)
  @for $i from 1 through $columns
    .row > .col-sm-, [class*='row-'] > .col-sm-
      width: ($i * 100% / $columns)
  .row > [class*='col-sm-'], [class*='row-'] > [class*='col-sm-']
    flex: none  .row > .col-sm-auto, [class*='row-'] > .col-sm-auto    flex: 1
<pre>
  <code>
    Normal line
    Inline <span class="highlight">highlight</span>
    <span class="line highlight">Complete line highlight</span>
  </code>
</pre>

With line numbers

@media (min-width: $breakpoint-small)  @for $i from 1 through $columns    .row > .col-sm-       width: ($i * 100% / $columns)  .row > [class*='col-sm-']    flex: none  .row > .col-sm-auto    flex: 1
<pre class="-numbered">
  <code>
    <span class="line">Normal line</span>
    <span class="line">Inline <span class="highlight">highlight</span></span>
    <span class="line highlight">Complete line highlight</span>
  </code>
</pre>

Inline

.red { background: #f00 }
<code>.red { background: #f00 }</code>
